message:
.NET to native

"@maryjofoley: Microsoft shows a glimpse of its mysterious 'Project N' compiler technology http://t.co/DkcPoMYm6P
name: Microsoft shows off its next-generation 'Project N' compiler technology | ZDNet
caption: www.zdnet.com
description: Microsoft execs quietly showed off new compiler technology under development at the company that aims to compile .Net code to native code directly.

data.message: اظن فى حلول موجوده بالفعل لتحويل كود السى شارب للسى بلس بلس وفى الغالب مدفوعه

I think Negen.exe just cash the translated vision of the assemble saving sometime for JIT compiler, And require the framework to run
